name: ChatterLocal
tag_list: twitter, social-media, social-media-monitoring, social-media-tools, local, hyperlocal
overview:
ChatterLocal helps businesses, nonprofits, candidates, individuals and the media track local convesations on Twitter.

The ChatterLocal.com application tracks Tweets based on location. Enter a keyword or hashtag and a city. ChatterLocal will search all Tweets and plot relevant Tweets on a local city map. You’ll instantly see the local sentiment on your topic, read local-only Tweets and find local influencers on your key topic. You’ll instantly find local people to connect with who care about what you care about. Find and promote local events, businesses, candidates, officials, bloggers and much more. www.chatterlocal.com
